Name: CloudTrailIsEnabled
Description: Checks that a CloudTrail exists that is set to multi-region.

Name: CloudTrailLogFileValidationEnabled
Description: Checks that CloudTrail Log Validation is Enabled in All Regions.

Name: CloudTrailS3BucketNotPublic
Description: Checks that the S3 Bucket used for CloudTrail logs is not public.

Name: CloudTrailWithCloudWatchLogsIsEnabled
Description: Checks that CloudTrail is integrated with CloudWatch Logs.

Name: CloudTrailLogsEncrypted
Description: Checks that CloudTrail logs are encrypted.

Name: ConfigIsEnabled
Description: Checks that AWS Config is Enabled in All Regions.

Name: IamUnusedCredentialsAreDisabled
Description: Checks that the IAM User's access keys have been used within the specified number of days.

Name: IamCredentialRotation
Description: Checks that the IAM User's access keys have been rotated within the specified number of days.

Name: IamRequireLowercaseCharacters
Description: Checks that the IAM password policy requires a lowercase character.

Name: IamRequireUppercaseCharacters
Description: Checks that the IAM password policy requires an uppercase character.

Name: IamRequireSymbols
Description: Checks that the IAM password policy requires a symbol.

Name: IamRequireNumbers
Description: Checks that the IAM password policy requires a number.

Name: IamPasswordExpiryIsEnabled
Description: Checks that the IAM password policy expires passwords older than the configured maximum age.

Name: IamPasswordReusePrevention
Description: Checks that the IAM password policy prevents password reuse.

Name: IamNoRootAccessKeys
Description: Checks that the root account's access keys have been disabled.

Name: IamRootHardwareMfaIsEnabled
Description: Checks that the root account has a MFA device Enabled.

Name: IamUsersMfaIsEnabled
Description: Checks that all IAM Users have a MFA device enabled.

Name: IamPoliciesAttachedGroupsOnly
Description: Checks that all IAM Users do not have policies attached to them.

Name: SecurityGroupsGlobalPort22
Description: Checks that all security groups adhere to rules per passed parameters.

Name: SecurityGroupsGlobalPort3389
Description: Checks that all security groups adhere to rules per passed parameters.

Name: SecurityGroupsDefaultDisablesTraffic
Description: Checks that all default security groups have no rules.

Name: VpcFlowLoggingIsEnabled
Description: Checks that all Vpc networks have flow logging enabled.
